extracted._comment: Verbatim or near-verbatim from page - these are facts
extracted.title: VISN Radiology Artificial Intelligence
extracted.description_text: The Department of Veterans Affairs, Veterans Health Administration (VHA), Network Contracting Office 1 is seeking sources for a VISN Radiology Artificial Intelligence platform. The requirement includes FDA-approved AI radiology solutions that can integrate with VA PACS, Vista Imaging, and Electronic Medical Health Record (EMHR) systems. Vendors must demonstrate capability to obtain Authority to Operate (ATO) with VA systems and comply with VHA Handbook 6500.6 security requirements.
requirements_summary: Authority to Operate (ATO) capability with VA systems
Integration with Electronic Medical Health Record (EMHR)
